title: Vase Mounted as an Ewer
medium: porcelain with light green celadon glaze and underglaze decoration in white slip, with lip, handle, and foot of gilded bronze
dimensions:
overall (without mount): 39.2 × 23.2 cm (15 7/16 × 9 1/8 in.)
overall (with mount): 61.2 × 24.6 cm (24 1/8 × 9 11/16 in.)
